attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: National Service should once again be compulsory for men and woman between the ages of 21-30, excluding those that have been in continuous full time employment for a minimum of 3 years or in a reserve occupation. Service length should be a minimum of 3 years and a maximum of 5 years. A choice of which service to serve in should be given with no interference by Government or any other body. If armed forces are deployed, National Service personal should be used to replace the regular army in areas that are not considered hostile. Pay should be inline with current miltary pay structures.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
